root.name: dys4ia
root.description: OverviewDys4ia was published on Newgrounds on March 9, 2012 and is divided into 4 chapters centered on different issues before, during and after the hormone replacement therapy, including recurring themes about how she is perceived by the people around her and her family and how to fit in.The game is available at http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/591565.

similar_games.game: I Get This Call Every Day
